data_quality.confidence_note: Excellent data quality from FootyStats API providing all key metrics. Only missing Betfair odds (blind pricing). Gabriel and Kulusevski injuries well documented.

notes: Both teams missing key players: Gabriel (Arsenal) and Kulusevski (Tottenham)
North London Derby context adds significant motivation for both sides
Arsenal's superior defensive record (0.45 vs 0.91 GA/J) is key differentiator
Tottenham overperforming xG (1.73 goals vs 1.21 xG) suggests unsustainable form
Strong home advantage for Arsenal (2.6 PPG at home vs Spurs 0.83 PPG at home)
Title race pressure for Arsenal vs Champions League hunt pressure for Spurs
